POCKET_ROCKS.description: Standard issue grey gravel. Great for checking gravity or breaking awkward silences.
POCKET_ROCKS.usage_msg: Gordon drops a rock. Clack. The path backward is physically verified. (Psi -0.2)

ANCHOR_STONE.description: A dense, black rock that refuses to move.
ANCHOR_STONE.usage_msg: Gordon kicks the heavy stone into the abyss. The rope snaps taut. (Drag = 0)

SILENT_KNIFE.description: A ceramic blade that cuts without sound.
SILENT_KNIFE.usage_msg: The Red String is cut. The connection is severed.

TIME_BRACELET.description: A chunky, beige wrist-computer from a timeline that got cancelled. Smells like ozone.
TIME_BRACELET.usage_msg: The bracelet hums. Narrative Drag is reduced by 50%. WARNING: Highly conductive.

BUCKET_OF_LIME.description: Industrial-grade whitewash. For when you need to pretend that 'incident' never happened.
BUCKET_OF_LIME.usage_msg: Gordon slaps a coat of white paint over the memory. It looks structural enough.

STABILITY_PIZZA.usage_msg: It tastes like childhood cartoons and hot plastic.

MEMORY_ARTIFACT.description: Useless junk. Why does he keep these? Proof he triumphed.
